meta.name: description
meta.content: Yadkin County Schools serves K-12th grade students and is located in Yadkinville, NC.

div.p: K Meadows came by the county office to checkout her art work hanging in the lobby. We have great talent in our county.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1350px; height: auto
div.p: Students who were certified in Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator also received a Design Specialist certification.
BR: Christopher Spann, Jackson Manning, and Terrance Anderson.
FR: Mairely Maldonado, and Abby Herko.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1350px; height: auto
div.p: Mr. Hendrick ( Hendrick Motor Sports), Zeke Matthews, Keith Senter. Zeke's team took first place in the Hendrick's Motor Sport Engine Build Competition.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1350px; height: auto
div.p: Letterland make-and-take fun with K-2 teachers. Thank you for your participation

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1350px; height: auto
div.p: HOSA takes part in Disaster training. Training is a community partnership with the North Carolina State Highway Patrol and Emergency Medical Services. Jeff Hinshaw is the facilitator of the event. This year’s scenario was a multi vehicle crash caused by a tractor trailer. The training took place at the Davie Community College training grounds and Davie county EMS building in Mocksville

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1350px; height: auto
div.p: The following student earned their Green-hand degree " and "Chapter degree" awards for activities they have completed since becoming a FFA members at SHS.

p.b: Jake Roberts (Greenhand), Arden Wagoner(Greenhand), Brooke Brandon(Greenhand), Macie Hutchens (chapter dergee)
Dylan Casstevens(Greenhand), Ethan Sizemore (Greenhand),Larry Smith (Greenhand), Mason Swaim (Greenhand), Trevor Moxley (Greenhand), Mallorie Hemric (Greenhand).

div.p: Yadkin County Schools Teachers of the Year

div.div: Welcome to Yadkin County Schools, where we are big enough to provide many educational opportunities, yet small enough to know every student personally.

img.alt: SAY SOMETHING-SANDY-HOOK PROMISE Reporting app Thumbnail Image

article.div: A new anonymous reporting System (SS_ARS) for students which most of North Caroling public school districts will be adopting this year to the reporting guidelines and standards developed by the NC Department of Public Instruction and the Center for Safe Schools

h1.a: Edition #2 of the Yadkin County Schools Magazine

article.div: We hope you enjoy our Second Edition of the Yadkin County Schools magazine!
